name: postybirb-plus-ui
Author: Michael DiCarlo
description: (UI) PostyBirb is an application that helps artists post art and other multimedia to multiple websites more quickly.

scripts.build: run-s build:clean build:tailwind build:antd-tweaks build:themes && react-scripts build && shx mv build ../electron-app
scripts.build:legacy: run-s build:clean build:tailwind build:antd-tweaks build:themes && react-scripts --openssl-legacy-provider build && shx mv build ../electron-app
scripts.build:style: npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:themes
scripts.build:antd-tweaks: tailwind build src/styles/antd-dark-tweaks.css -o public/styles/dark-tweaks.css && tailwind build src/styles/antd-light-tweaks.css -o public/styles/light-tweaks.css && tailwind build src/styles/antd-base-tweaks.css -o public/styles/antd-tweaks.css
